data.actual_result: The DM channel opens up for a (split) second before snapping back to the text channel you where previous active in
data.expected_result: The android app opens up the DM channel the notification is from
data.short_description: Notifications to DMs don't lead to them on press if the app wasn't open prior
data.steps_to_repro: - Have the app closed - Get a notification from a new DM you didn't have open prior to closing the app - Open the notification
